title: Ardignas family

properties.value: The Ardignas family is the current royal family of Kandarin. There have supposedly been five kings of the Ardignas bloodline (six as of Song of the Elves).

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ardignas family
 This article is currently in the middle of an expansion or major revamping.
The information contained within it should not be considered fully accurate and/or complete. You can help by contributing to it.

The Ardignas family is the current royal family of Kandarin. There have supposedly been five kings of the Ardignas bloodline (six as of Song of the Elves).

The dynasty is a fairly short one, beginning somewhere between 98 and 101 of the Fifth Age and continuing in the present day. The line was founded by either the Saradominist or the Zamorakian survivor of the the Great Battle.[1] The brothers of Tyras and Lathas ruled over the city of Ardougne in two parts, Tyras in the West, and Lathas in the East, until Tyras' assassination on an expedition to the west.

Following the Ardougne Revolution, Lathas's and Tyras' relative, Thoros, was crowned king of Kandarin.

Bloodline[edit | edit source]

  • First King of Kandarin, name unknown (one of the two survivors of the Great Battle): Year 101 of the Fifth Age - Unknown
  • 'Mad' King Narras: Unknown - Unknown
  • King Ulthas: Unknown - 136 Fifth Age
  • King Tyras: Year 136 - 169 Fifth Age
  • King Lathas: Year 136 - 169 Fifth Age
  • King Thoros: 169 Fifth Age - Present

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jorral, "Making History", Old School RuneScape. "A battle ensued that ended with the two ex-friends at the top of the outpost as the sole survivors. Realising their mistakes they made friends again. One decided to become King and spread the word of equality [...] The one that became king is the great grandfather of the King Lathas that we know!"

The '''Ardignas family''' is the current royal family of [[Kandarin]]. There have supposedly been five kings of the Ardignas bloodline (six as of [[Song of the Elves]]).

The dynasty is a fairly short one, beginning somewhere between 98 and 101 of the [[Fifth Age]] and continuing in the present day. The line was founded by either the [[Saradomin]]ist or the [[Zamorak]]ian survivor of the [[the Great Battle]].{{CiteNPC |npc=Jorral |loc=Making History |quote=A battle ensued that ended with the two ex-friends at the top of the outpost as the sole survivors. Realising their mistakes they made friends again. One decided to become King and spread the word of equality [...] The one that became king is the great grandfather of the King Lathas that we know!}} The brothers of Tyras and Lathas ruled over the city of [[Ardougne]] in two parts, Tyras in the [[West Ardougne|West]], and Lathas in the [[East Ardougne|East]], until Tyras' assassination on an expedition to the west.

Following the [[Ardougne Revolution]], Lathas's and Tyras' relative, [[King Thoros|Thoros]], was crowned king of Kandarin. 

==Bloodline==
* First King of Kandarin, name unknown (one of the two survivors of [[the Great Battle]]): Year 101 of the Fifth Age - Unknown
* [[King Narras|'Mad' King Narras]]: Unknown - Unknown
* [[King Ulthas]]: Unknown - 136 Fifth Age
* [[King Tyras]]: Year 136 - 169 Fifth Age
* [[King Lathas]]: Year 136 - 169 Fifth Age
* [[King Thoros]]: 169 Fifth Age - ''Present''
